column4: Ok, I tried all of your advises and none of them kill the process...How do I find which process is not responding ?  (damn, this is soooo easy in Windows)

There are other things which are not easy at all in windows. Damn windows printing system died and was completely unfixable. Had to reinstall to get it to work. So not everything is easier in windows. Actually thats when I gave up on windows and installed ubuntu. It just takes a bit of getting used to.
